item.title: Helpz :) with nubby thing
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

add this in ur process method… in playerhandler.java

if( MaxConnections = 20 ) {
client.returnCode = 7;
}

in client.java
make this

public int returnCode = 2;

this

public static int returnCode = 2;

You Can Try It

this (hopefally) will make them get “there is too many players online”

item.title: Helpz :) with nubby thing
item.dc:creator: @isaac2k4 isaac2k4
item.description:
@isaac2k4 wrote:

ok

[code]public static int MaxConnections = 20;
public static String[] Connections = new String[MaxConnections];
public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections];
public static boolean ShutDown = false;
public static int ShutDownCounter = 0;[/code]

ive set max players ( connections ) but more ppl can join…

is there another way i can stop max connections.

All my npcs face south how can i change it to east?

thx[br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2007, 11:07:27 AM[/size][hr]???
